LanguageData.JRWTorosaurus.label: Torosaurus
LanguageData.JRWTorosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #0481-1891 [TOROSAURUS LATUS] CODENAME: PERFORATE >732
A small ceratopsian with a slender, almost flat frill. Recent studies suggest that it and Triceratops horridus are perhaps the same creature, leaving the genus dubious, but valid, for now.
LanguageData.JRWTorosaurus.tools.horn-0.label: horn
LanguageData.JRWTorosaurus.tools.horn-1.label: horn
LanguageData.JRWTorosaurus.tools.head.label: head
